name: suuupra-test-orchestrator
description: Comprehensive testing framework for Suuupra microservices

scripts.install-deps: npm run install-deps:node && npm run install-deps:python && npm run install-deps:go
scripts.install-deps:node: for dir in services/*/; do (cd "$dir" && [ -f package.json ] && npm install || true); done
scripts.install-deps:python: for dir in services/*/; do (cd "$dir" && [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip install -r requirements.txt || true); done
scripts.install-deps:go: for dir in services/*/; do (cd "$dir" && [ -f go.mod ] && go mod tidy || true); done

author: Suuupra Team
